description: The pun humorously plays on weather terminology and logical reasoning.
title: Cloudy Logic
n_1: John debates with Mike, a weather forecaster, on a sunny day.
n_2: The sun blazes on, but Mike insists on impending rain.
n_3: Hours pass with no sign of rain, John smirks at Mike.
n_4: As the sun sets clear, John teases Mike about his 'cloudy' logic.
